actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a commission to develop proposals regarding voting representation for citizens of the United States who reside in a territory, commonwealth, or Federal District of the United States.
short_title: We the People Commission on Full Representation Act of 2019

summary.text:
We the People Commission on Full Representation Act of 2019 

This bill establishes the We the People Commission on Full Representation. The commission must develop proposals and report to Congress regarding voting representation for

 Puerto Rico, the District of Columbia, Guam, the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, and the Northern Mariana Islands.

titles.title: We the People Commission on Full Representation Act of 2019
We the People Commission on Full Representation Act of 2019

A bill to establish a commission to develop proposals regarding voting representation for citizens of the United States who reside in a territory, commonwealth, or Federal District of the United States.
